name: Earth Defense Sim
description:
A top-down space shooter that gets increasingly difficult as you play. Avoid the enemies' attacks while collecting green and blue capsules to gain health and damage boosts respectively. Explore the battlefield with the pause menu freecam ;)

How to play:

  • Move with W/A/S/D
  • Shoot with Spacebar
  • Use the dodge move that grants brief invincibility by pressing Left Shift
  • Collect Green (health boost) and Blue (damage increase) Capsules
  • Kill enemies to gain points

Game only available as download. My dumbass didn't realize WebGL and HDRP are not on speaking terms until after I had finished the game. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
